title: Follow live: Florida, Houston square off in title game

title: Smith, Carroll have 'unfinished business' in Vegas
description: Geno Smith said Monday that he and coach Pete Carroll have "unfinished business" with the Raiders.
author: Ryan McFadden

title: We watched every Premier League manager - here's what we found out
description: We watched every Premier League manager during this weekend's 10 fixtures - here's what we found out.

title: Where do Premier League managers stand during a game?
description: BBC Sport analysed every Premier League manager during their matches at the weekend to see what each one did. These are the results.

title: Juric leaves Southampton
description: Ivan Juric has left Southampton after the club's Premier League's relegation was confirmed.

title: Van Dijk indicates 'progress' in talks over new Liverpool contract
description: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk has indicated there has been "progress" in talks over a long-awaited new deal to keep him at Anfield.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 10 - Charles Johnson (1971-78)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Johnson wore only jersey No. 10 and put up 7.9 points, 2.6 rebounds, 1.8 assists, and 1.2 steals per game.

title: Unioto delivers Coach Taylor his 400th win in 3-0 shutout of SVC rival
description: Coach Tony Taylor recorded his 400th win on Monday night as his Unioto Sherman Tanks defeated Paint Valley 3-0.
